aircraft.value: Sparrow Light - AC-2943-322 at Base Alpha

defect_observed.value: Pressure regulator drift. Issue identified during pre-flight checks.

root_cause.value: Component fatigue due to operational stress cycles exceeding design limits

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Bleed Air System component. Functional testing confirmed the reported anomaly.

corrective_action.value: Replace defective component with serviceable unit from approved stock

preventive_action.value: Implement quality control check at manufacturing stage

remarks_investigation.value: Detailed examination conducted. Corrective measures implemented.

remarks_design.value: Technical evaluation completed. Proposed preventive measures are appropriate and align with design intent. Date: 04/03/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Dr. A.K. Sharma

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality assurance review completed. Recommend enhanced incoming inspection criteria for this component type. Date: 05/03/2024 Signature: Air Cmde S.B. Rao

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) User feedback incorporated. Recommend enhanced crew training on system operation and limitations. Date: 08/03/2024 Signature: Eng. K.N. Iyer

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Regulatory quality requirements verified. Proposed actions meet airworthiness standards. Recommend approval. Date: 11/03/2024 Signature: Sqn Ldr H.S. Bhatia

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Design authority review completed. Recommend continued airworthiness monitoring of affected component type. Date: 13/03/2024 Signature: Sqn Ldr A.R. Desai
